author: Simon Difford
description: Gin-laced zesty citrus with subtle freshening mint with aromatic bitters adding depth of flavour and complexity.
name: Fallen Angel
recipeIngredient: 2.5 ml Green crème de menthe green
15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)
2 Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
